body.name: Z-Edge 30 inch 144Hz/200Hz Curved Gaming Monitor, 1080P Computer Monitor, UG30 21:9 Ultra Wide, 1500R/1ms MPRT, Frameless/Slim PC Monitor with HDMI/DP Display Port, Freesync Compatible, VESA
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 8 mins
FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 8 mins
features: [200Hz Gaming monitor & 1ms MPRT(HDMI1 2.0+DP 1.2)]Elevate your gaming experience with a refresh rate of 200Hz and an impressive response time of 1ms MPRT. Fluid motion like never before allows you to react instantaneously to whatever unfolds on the screen before others even have time to process it. Gain absolute control over every movement and dominate the battlefield with unprecedented speed and precision

[1500R Curved Gaming Monitor] The Z-Edge 30 inch PC monitor boasts a curvature of 1500R, providing an immersive viewing experience that wraps around your field of vision. This allows for better depth perception and reduces eye strain during prolonged gaming sessions

[WFHD 1080P Resolution and HDR Support] Experience stunning visuals on the Z-Edge 30 inch ultrawide monitor. With a resolution of 2560*1080, you can enjoy crystal-clear images and vibrant colors that bring every detail to life. HDR will balance exposure during the day and brings greater clarity at night.(Note: Only the HDMI port supports HDR) The 3000:1 contrast ratio presents the deep blacks and brilliant whites, allowing you to capture more image details even in the dark

[Freesync Function] Equipped with Freesync technology, this curved monitor synchronizes the refresh rate between the graphics card and the display to eliminate screen tearing and stuttering. This results in smooth gameplay and provides a competitive edge by ensuring rapid response times without any distractions

[Ergonomic and Sleek Design] Connect your devices easily with the Z-Edge 30 inch computer monitor. With its HDMI/DP Display Port, it offers rich compatibility, allowing you to connect to a wide range of devices for an enhanced gaming experience. Note: If you connect the monitor to PS4/PS5/Xbox the split screen issue happens please go to our official website to download the firmware to fix this issue

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Z-edge UG30 200Hz Ultrawide Curved Gaming Monitor

200Hz Refresh Rate With rapid 200Hz refresh rate, you will get the unparalleled smooth gaming experience. 1ms Response Time Combined with lightning 1ms response time makes you get more wins in the battlefield. WFHD 2560*1080P Ultra-wide WFHD(2560*1080) monitor delivers crisp and razor-sharp images. 30inch 21:9 Aspect Ratio With a 2560*1080 resolution and 21:9 aspect ratio, you can view more webpages without zooming out.

1500R Curved Monitor R1500 curvature matches human eyes visual field, enhanced the depth of perception, making you immersed more into the games. FreeSync Support Reducing monitor from stuttering and tearing, keeps motion fluidity even in fast-paced games. Three-sided Frameless Design Featuring a slim bezel on three sides and no distractions from the dazzlingly precise, you can expand your view with multiple monitors. VESA Mount Support Easily install the monitor on the wall or mounting arm with the VESA mount.

Does this monitor have PIP and PBP? Yes, this model supports PIP and PBP features. What type of HDMI and DP port does it have? What refresh rate can this monitor run on HDMI and DP? Both of the HDMI ports are 2.0 and it can support up to 200Hz refresh rate, The DP port is 1.2port and it can support 200Hz refresh rate. Would this monitor be good for PS5? Yes this monitor will be a great option for the PS5.Our monitor has the HDMI 2.0 output so it can support PS5 for up to 120Hz at 1080P resolution. What are the dimensions of the monitor? The screen width is 27.8in, screen height with stand is 16in without the stand is 12.6in, screen depth with stand is 7.7in without the stand is 3.3in. Does it support HDR and Free Sync? Yes it does, please note that HDR requires HDMI port, and Free Sync requires DP port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good monitor for the price
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is really good! It’s very clear and I like how it has built in speakers. For the money this is a very solid monitor and I haven’t had any issues with it so far. It’s bright and clear and pretty big. I loved the curve design of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so I'll be honest. I gave this monitor a REALLY good rating, even though I hated it. Maybe hate is a strong word. A little backstory will help.I've been working from home since Covid started, just using a laptop on the corner of my personal pc gaming desk. I finally got fed up and decided to build a specific WORK workspace, since I spend at least 40 hours a week working. When in the physical office, I had a 3 monitor setup, and the real estate the three monitors offers is awesome.So I build the desk, and decide to order 3 new matching monitors. 29 inch looks good. Ultra wide? Sure, more real estate, right? So I shop and decide to take a chance on the Z Edge monitors.When I got the boxes, I was immediately wary. I should be clear that I was only basing the wariness on the DIMENSIONS of the box, not the condition or anything. So I open one up and my fear were realized. These things were SHORT. Meaning, yeah, 29 inches and yeah, ultrawide, but coming from a world of 27" "normal" screens, these were easy 2/3 the height of what I was used to.Seems in my happiness to go from 27 to 29 in, I really didnt consider the size difference. It would have helped, sure, if the sales page on amazon listed the screen dimensions (they do have the box dimensions. To be clear, THIS IS MY FAULT, not the fault of the manufacturer.So I hooked one up anyways. Honestly, the picture was AWESOME. It looked really good, the refresh was good. I opened videos, played a couple games. It was nice.BUT.. the shortness meant that i was now squeezing stuff like code editors, log watchers, policy managers into a MUCH smaller space (I use these a lot in full screen while working). Even switching the monitor to vertical would have "pinched" my screens in a way I didnt like.So, while I did not like how short they were, the quality and performance was fine. I've seen people here on amazon giving bad reviews for reasons that are NOT the fault of the manufacturer, and I refuse to do so. My usage of this monitor was only a couple of days to see if I could get used to the form factor.So, if you understand that these things are a bit on the squat side, and hence, the height of your real estate is smaller than before, then you wont have an issue here. Based on my usage, the monitors are great. Just doesnt fit my own personal preference.So I packed it up and shipped it back, and bought some 27 inch QHD monitors instead.Hope this helps someone make an informed decision :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Monitor at a great price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. In the world of working from home, I was sorely needing a second monitor. I'm thoroughly pleased that I picked this monitor to be my second monitor. The actual video quality from this monitor is fantastic. The quality has certainly blown me away. The colors are very vibrant and it's sharp. Check out the video - It should speak for itself.Pros:- Great video quality.- Has AMD Freesync! I haven't tried it out though.- Slim and low profile- VESA mounting!- Has Speakers - Can be used as a standalone TV if you input a video source. Video has the monitor playing the music.Indifferent:- The buttons are physical push buttons locateded on the back of the panel with labels on the front. While I would've preferred the slicker soft touch buttons seen on other monitors, some may prefer the physical buttons. To be honest, since the buttons are hidden, I don't even care about this.- The stand was a bit difficult to install as it needed a decent amount of force. But I just used the stand to test it and then immediately VESA mounted it.Areas of improvement:- The UI system initially made me think I had a defective monitor! If you have no video coming into the monitor, it will briefly turn on and then immediately turn off! You cannot use the menu without a video input and the monitor doesn't idle at all without a video input! I guess it's a power saving feature but I initially thought the monitor was dead because of an issue with my computer!- Turns on slightly slower than my other monitor, but it's not a huge deal and I've gotten used to it.Overall, this was a fantastically well-priced monitor that has absolutely exceeded my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great budget monitor
reviews.reviewText: I was super skeptical about buying a monitor from a brand I was not familiar with, but this monitor was a pleasant surprise.First of all, it's huge, and the picture quality is great. Really easy to set up and 100% what I was looking for as my first "over sized" gaming monitor purchase.The RGB ring light on the back is not visible or bright enough to really be seen unless you're looking right at it, but that wasn't one of the selling points for me so it's not anything that I'd complain about.The only thing that is actually frustrating to me about this monitor, but is something you can easily work around, is that the monitor stand/base does not move at all, so you can't raise/lower it which is why I only gave it a 4 star review.Overall though, a great budget monitor with easy set up and great picture quality.
La verdad estoy impresionado con su forma curvada, tamaño ultrawide y calidad de imagen, la mejor compra, lo recomiendo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Z-Edge 30-inch curved gaming monitor is a stellar addition to my setup. The picture quality is outstanding, boasting vivid colors and clarity that elevate the gaming experience. So far, it's been working flawlessly, and the 200Hz refresh rate contributes to an incredibly smooth display, making fast-paced games a joy to play. The ultra-wide 21:9 aspect ratio and 2560x1080 resolution enhance immersion, providing an expansive view. Overall, this monitor impresses with its performance, image quality, and smooth refresh rate. Highly recommended for gaming enthusiasts seeking a visually stunning and responsive display.
マジで買ってよかった！モニターアームも買ったけど必要なかったです音量は最初50に設定されているので後ろのスイッチで変更出来ますMPRT等その他設定もスイッチで出来ます

reviews.reviewTitle: ウルトラワイド入門編
reviews.reviewText: 無名メーカーなので微妙かと思ったが、そこらの有名モニターメーカーよりも品質が良い。梱包は丁寧で本体、説明書共に日本語対応。モニター自体も品質が極めて高い。ブラウジングにも動画視聴にもゲームにも向いている。VAモニターなので感動するほど画質が良いというわけではないが、この価格帯では美しい部類だと思う。付属のモニタースタンドは見た目が悪いが意外と使いやすそう。ただし三脚は危険なのでモニターアームにつなげた方が良さそうではある。ゲーミングモニターが欲しい。綺麗なモニターが欲しい。一風変わったワイドで曲面のモニターが欲しい。大画面のモニターが欲しい。欲張りな人におすすめ。多分満足するだろう。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for son for Christmas bargain
